Package controllerPackage

package controllerPackage
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddNewDishToFile
    class used to write a new line of data to a text file
    CalculateKcalPerDish
    method used to calculate total meal calories
    CompareDishes
    the class is used to search for dishes in a list using their names
    CompareNameFromDishListAndReturnId
    the class is used to search for dishes in a list using their names
    CreateNewDish
    class used to take user input data
    DeleteDishFromFile
    delete dish from text file
    GetIndredientsListToList
    class returns list of all ingredients, based on the text file
    GetMealList
    generate table/list of all meals, based on the text file
    GetOneMealKcalData
    get total kilocalories per one meal
    IngredientsSet
    class used to add ingredients to complicated meals
    PressToContinue
    use class to temporarily suspend the display of the main menu
    RecommendedTotalCaloriesPerPerson
    Used formulas: For women, BMR = 655.1 + (9.563 x weight in kg) + (1.850 x height in cm) - (4.676 x age in years) For men, BMR = 66.47 + (13.75 x weight in kg) + (5.003 x height in cm) - (6.755 x age in years)
